headline.main: Forms Part of a Living Chain

lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Jan. 1 -- Prime Minister Churchill welcomed the new year by proposing a Victory toast at a midnight ceremony in the dining car of his special train "somewhere in Vermont," with members of his staff, newspaper correspondents, the train crew and porters.
